channel.title: Disapperaing?
channel.description:
Ok I have a transform shop in my client, and when you buy the lobby, you turn into a lobby.
But, I do not know what happend, but anything in the transform shop you eat, you just disapear
any ideas?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 07, 2007, 02:14:26 AM[/size][hr]Please Help!, I will give you the source if you will fix this.

item.title: Disapperaing?
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

no, you see now it does nothing at all.

I do not know what to do, everyone loved this on the server.

Please Help!

item.title: Disapperaing?
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

here is one:

		case 379: //Lobster
			npcId = 1693;
			isNpc = true;
			updateRequired = true;
			appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                            sendMessage("You are a Giant Lobster!");
                            sendMessage("Type ::human to transform back!");	
			deleteItem(379, getItemSlot(379), 1);	
                            break;

this did work, until I did something, but I do not know what?

Read full topic
